divs: sighting detailsi was traveling s.ih-35 near mcneil rd. on my way to work at u.s. postal facility. i noticed a bright object approximately 30 meters to my right and parallel to my window. i did not think; i just observed the object and still have no idea, what it was. the object was a bright, approximately 12-16" in diameter. i first noticed a downward motion and then an object traveling parallel(eye level\same speed) to my truck for several miles. after the fact, i reviewed the incident; comparing it to a meteor:color,speed,trails,motions. the object then moved slowly down and to the right behind a tree line.
Summary: Traveling S IH-35 when object appeared on my right side of vehicle.
trends: There have been 30 other sightings in McKinney
There were no other sightings in McKinney on or around December 26th 2007
